text: The Nigeria Football Federation (NFA) is the governing body of football in Nigeria. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1945. It became a member of CAF in 1959 and FIFA in 1960. Category:1945 establishments Category:1940s establishments in Africa Category:20th-century establishments in Nigeria Category:Football governing bodies in Africa Category:Football in Nigeria Category:Organizations based in Nigeria
title: Nigeria Football Federation
